title: Honor Capsules Are Worthless
body: I got an honor capsule today and got Annie and Kayle skin shards plus 2 key fragments. The previous honor capsule I got had a 450 champ and a 520 skin. Considering how rare the capsules are they are worthless since they dont drop full keys and you can get less blue essence than level up rewards and no skin shards.

replies.body:
I have had half a dozen honour capsules, and all they have given me is lowest tier champ shards.

If I didn't already have over 100 champs and 50+ skins, I'd be quitting this game in disgust over the changes.
probably better saving those capsules until an update and then open them
As a returning player they do seem that way but are highly efficient for "newer" players
